data.title: Software License and Product Agreements
data.meta_description: For all Quest Software products, access information regarding your end user license or product agreements, or third party agreements, all right here.
data.text:
If you purchased a Quest Software product that is licensed by Quest Software Inc. or a Quest Software affiliate or subsidiary, your quotation, order acknowledgement, invoice or receipt will confirm the product titles(s) that you purchased. The agreement applicable to your use of the product is available below (including software preinstalled on hardware or made available to you by download, disk media or otherwise, at no additional cost).

You may also locate the agreement applicable to your use of a product that is licensed by Quest Software or a Quest Software affiliate or subsidiary among the agreements below if you have been directed to this page from an internet address or hyperlink (1) referenced in a separately-signed agreement with Quest Software or a Quest Software affiliate or subsidiary, (2) published in a manual or other product or service documentation provided in connection with your purchase, (3) available within the graphical user-interface of a software application licensed by Quest Software or a Quest Software affiliate or subsidiary, or (4) presented at the log-in screen of a web-based portal intended to provide you with hosted or online access to software provided by Quest Software or a Quest Software affiliate or subsidiary.

Software Transaction Agreement

These regional Software Transaction Product Agreements govern your use of Quest products to which this agreement is attached or otherwise associated.

Quest Software Public Sector Inc. Software Transaction Agreement

Products licensed to U.S. federal, state, and local government agencies are described at https://questpublicsector.com/ and available through DLT via https://www.dlt.com/government-products/quest .

Third Party License Agreements

Some of our products incorporate third party components whose licenses require us to publish copies of the licensing language and/or copyright notices. In compliance with those requirements, copies of such license terms are found here.

Data Processing Addendum

These Data Processing Addendums govern your use of Quest Software products (including SaaS) where the applicable Software Transaction Agreement incorporates the Data Processing Addendum by reference.
